description: These are some of the mobile and web projects I've worked on, including replicas of well-known platforms and applications built from scratch. Each project demonstrates my attention to detail and passion for solving problems through technology, always aiming to deliver intuitive and functional user experiences.

web.title: Mercado Libre Web Clone
web.description: I developed an exact replica of the Mercado Libre website, where users can search for products, list them, and view their details.

mobile.title: Mercado Libre Mobile Clone
mobile.description: I created an exact replica of the Mercado Libre mobile app, allowing users to search for products, list them, and view their details.

mobile.title: Instagram Mobile Clone
mobile.description: I created a replica of the Instagram mobile app, where users can simulate login, view stories, posts, and profiles.

artwork.title: Beatriz's Art
artwork.description: I developed a website for a Colombian artist where users can explore her artwork, learn more about her, and access her contact information.

arrendamientos_alvarez.title: Arrendamientos Álvarez
arrendamientos_alvarez.description: I designed a website for a real estate agency in Medellín, enabling users to view properties, filter them, and access the PSE portal for payments.

selvatica.title: Selvática
selvatica.description: I developed a simulation of a coffee e-commerce platform where users can browse products, add them to the shopping cart, and see the checkout page.

blackjack.title: Blackjack Game
blackjack.description: I created a blackjack game to test my programming skills and have fun at the same time.
